detail_desc: Glittery tulle skirt with a shimmering elastic waistband. Lined.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with an asymmetric hem. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with an asymmetric hem. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with an asymmetric hem. Jersey lining.

Short dress in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Short dress in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Short dress in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Dress in a crinkled weave with a round neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves with two flounces at the cuffs. Lined.

Dress in a crinkled weave with a round neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves with two flounces at the cuffs. Lined.
Lace dress with a zip at the back, gathered seam at the waist, 3/4-length sleeves and an airy chiffon skirt. Jersey lining.
Lace dress with a zip at the back, gathered seam at the waist, 3/4-length sleeves and an airy chiffon skirt. Jersey lining.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell denim. V-neck front and back, a sewn-in wrapover at the front, diagonal side pockets and an elasticated seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Bracelets in various designs, one with an elastic strap and four in an adjustable length.
Bracelets in various designs, one with an elastic strap and four in an adjustable length.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a stretch dobby weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood, zip down the front, front pockets and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Soft pile lining.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood, zip down the front, front pockets and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Soft pile lining.
T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from a cotton blend with an open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.

Long coat in jacquard-weave viscose with narrow notch lapels, covered buttons at the front and flap welt pockets. High slits in the sides and tape-trimmed inner seams. Unlined.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.

Pull-on jeans in stretch denim with elastication and a small frill at the waist and fake front pockets. Loose fit with gently tapered legs. Patterned jersey lining.

Trousers in an airy jacquard weave made partly from recycled polyester with a high, elasticated drawstring waist. Concealed pockets in the side seams, a lower crotch and extra-wide legs. Jersey lining at the top.

Short, off-the-shoulder top in an airy jacquard weave made partly from recycled polyester. Elastication and a wide flounce at the top and narrow ties that fasten at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with narrow elastication, and a smocked hem. Unlined.
